welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kure, Japan! Known for its rich naval history and beautiful coastline, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering Kure!

restaurants.name: 呉龍
restaurants.description: 呉龍 is a ramen restaurant located in 呉市.

restaurants.name: Iseya (田舎洋食 いせ屋)
restaurants.description: Iseya (田舎洋食 いせ屋) is a yoshoku restaurant located in 呉市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hiroshima West Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hiroshima West Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
